DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.sys_pd_header s left join xbs.po_header p on s.primary_document_id=p.id left join xbs.sys_process_flow_header s0 on s.process_flow_header_id=s0.sys_process_flow_header_id left join xbs.option_line o on s.status=o.option_line_id left join xbs.user_v u on s.originator=u.xerp_user_id left join xbs.sys_process_flow_line s1 on s.current_process_flow_line_id=s1.sys_process_flow_line_id left join xbs.user_v u0 on s.owner_user_id=u0.xerp_user_id left join xbs.user_v u1 on s.created_by=u1.xerp_user_id left join xbs.user_v u2 on s.last_update_by=u2.xerp_user_id left join xbs.org o0 on s.org_id=o0.org_id
DbDetails.Data: p.po_number primary_document_id,s0.process_flow process_flow_header_id,s.security_level,o.option_line_value status,s.priority,u.NAME originator,s1.line_name current_process_flow_line_id,s.origination_date,u0.NAME owner_user_id,s.release_date,s.completion_date,s.description,u1.NAME created_by,s.creation_date,u2.NAME last_update_by,s.last_update_date,o0.org org_id,s.sys_pd_header_id,s.primary_document,s.document_number
